Sentence.sentence: Trying to quantify or measure the impact of women in politics is hard because in very few countries have there been enough women in politics to make a difference,"says Anne-Marie Goetz, peace and security adviser for U.N. Women.
When those were finished, she concluded the session with a brief restatement of how the new system would improve security and peace of mind in the municipal building.

means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 皮斯 Pace的变体

Sentence.sentence: Addams helped the poor and worked for peace.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: But, Kate, I still think old age should be about peace and relaxation.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Daughter elisabeth explains, "our mother taught us that to succeed we must have unity, and to have unity we must have peace."
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语安徽卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: He can have some peace and quiet.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 听力 选项

Sentence.sentence: He likes that he can sit and check his phone in peace or chat up the barkeeper with whom he's on a first-name basis if he wants to have a little interaction.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: He told his family he was at peace.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: It gives us a great feeling of peace.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Now Alia waited for the war to end and dreamed of peace and a new library.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: She encouraged a sense of community社区 by creating shelters and promoting education and services for people in need in 1931, addams became the first American woman to win the nobel peace prize.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: One of these urges had to do with creating a state of peace in the midst of turbulence, a “still point of the turning world,” to borrow a phrase from T.
A sacred place of peace, however crude it may be, is a distinctly human need, as opposed to shelter, which is a distinctly animal need.

sentences.en: The people desire peace, security and happiness.
sentences.cn: 人民向往和平、安全与幸福。

sentences.en: After a brief peace, war broke out again.
sentences.cn: 在短暂的和平之后, 战争又爆发了。

sentences.en: She had a silver peace symbol hanging on a chain around her neck.
sentences.cn: 她有一个银制的和平标志挂在项链上。

sentences.en: They were charged with disturbing public peace.
sentences.cn: 他们被指控扰乱社会治安。

sentences.en: Knowing that she had arrived safely restored my peace of mind.
sentences.cn: 得知她平安到达, 我就安心了。

sentences.en: All I want is a bit of peace and quiet.
sentences.cn: 我所希望的只是一点平静。

means.word_mean: 【植物】和平月季(一种杂交香水月季，开大黄花)

sentence.cn: 亚当帮助穷人，为和平而努力。

lj.lj_ly: Labour should &B{make its peace with} the Lib-Dems.
lj.lj_ls: 工党应当与自由民主党和解。

lj.lj_ly: Labour should &B{make its peace with} the Lib-Dems.
lj.lj_ls: 工党应当与自由民主党和解。

jx.jx_en_mean: In a state of tranquillity; serene
jx.jx_cn_mean: 平静的，平和的：处于宁静状态的；平静的

lj.lj_ly: She is at peace with herself and her friends.
lj.lj_ls: 她平和地对待自己和朋友

lj.lj_ly: Everyone wants to live in a world at peace.
lj.lj_ls: 人人都想生活在一个和平的世界里

phrase.cizu_name: keep one's peace 或 hold one's peace

jx.jx_en_mean: To maintain or observe law and order
jx.jx_cn_mean: 保持和平：维持或遵守法律或社会秩序

lj.lj_ly: officers who were sworn to keep the peace.
lj.lj_ls: 发誓要维护好社会秩序的警官

entry.def: If countries or groups involved in a war or violent conflict are discussing peace, they are talking to each other in order to try to end the conflict.

example.ex: Peace talks involving other rebel leaders and government representatives broke up without agreement last week, but are due to resume shortly...
example.tran: 上个星期，其他叛军领导人和政府代表之间的和谈没能达成协议，宣告破裂，但是和谈不久会重开。

example.ex: Leaders of some rival factions signed a peace agreement last week...
example.tran: 上周，一些敌对派系领导人签订了和平协议。

entry.def: If there is peace in a country or in the world, there are no wars or violent conflicts going on.

example.ex: The President spoke of a shared commitment to world peace and economic development.
example.tran: 总统提到了共同致力于世界和平和经济发展。

example.ex: ...the Nobel Peace Prize.
example.tran: 诺贝尔和平奖

entry.def: If you disapprove of weapons, especially nuclear weapons, you can use peace to refer to campaigns and other activities intended to reduce their numbers or stop their use.
entry.tran: 和平运动；裁军运动（尤指核裁军运动）

example.ex: ...two peace campaigners accused of causing damage to an F1-11 nuclear bomber...
example.tran: 被控破坏一架F1-11核轰炸机的两名和平运动者

example.ex: He campaigned for peace and against the spread of nuclear weapons.
example.tran: 他为裁军运动和反对核武器扩散而奔走。

entry.def: If you have peace, you are not being disturbed, and you are in calm, quiet surroundings.

example.ex: All I want is to have some peace and quiet and spend a couple of nice days with my grandchildren...
example.tran: 我就想清静一下，和孙子孙女们一起好好呆几天。

example.ex: One more question and I'll leave you in peace.
example.tran: 再问一个问题，我就不打扰你了。

entry.def: If you have a feeling of peace, you feel contented and calm and not at all worried. You can also say that you are at peace.

example.ex: I had a wonderful feeling of peace and serenity when I saw my husband...
example.tran: 看到我丈夫时，我有一种异常平静安详的奇妙感觉。

example.ex: The peace of the Lord be always with you...
example.tran: 愿主的平和与你永在。

entry.def: If there is peace among a group of people, they live or work together in a friendly way and do not quarrel. You can also say that people live or work in peace with each other.

example.ex: ...a period of relative peace in the country's industrial relations...
example.tran: 该国劳资关系相对和睦的一段时期

example.ex: If you can't live in peace with your little brother then get out of the house.
example.tran: 如果你没法和你弟弟和睦相处，就滚出这座房子。

entry.def: The Peace of a particular place is a treaty or an agreement that was signed there, bringing an end to a war.

example.ex: The Peace of Ryswick was signed in September 1697.
example.tran: 《里斯维克和约》签订于1697年9月。

entry.def: If you hold or keep your peace, you do not speak, even though there is something you want or ought to say.

example.ex: ...people who knew about this evil man but held their peace...
example.tran: 了解这个恶棍却默不作声的人们

example.ex: I felt it politic to keep my peace and play the part of the attentive listener.
example.tran: 我觉得保持沉默、做一名专心的听众比较明智。

entry.def: If someone in authority, such as the army or the police, keeps the peace, they make sure that people behave and do not fight or quarrel with each other.

example.ex: ...the first UN contingent assigned to help keep the peace in Cambodia...
example.tran: 派往柬埔寨协助维持治安的第一批联合国分遣队

example.ex: How did your mother succeed in keeping the peace between these two very different men?
example.tran: 你母亲是如何做到让这两个性格迥异的男人相安无事的？

entry.def: If the law requires you to keep the peace, you must behave well and not cause any trouble in public.

example.ex: The demonstrators were bound over to keep the peace.
example.tran: 示威者一定要遵纪守法。

entry.def: If you make peace with someone or make your peace with them, you put an end to your quarrel with them, often by apologizing.

example.ex: The President ought to seize this opportunity to make his peace with political parties and negotiate a speedy return to democracy...
example.tran: 总统应该抓住这个机会与各政党握手言好，协商尽快恢复民主。

example.ex: All of a sudden she seemed to want to make peace and patch up our quarrel.
example.tran: 突然她似乎想要和好，结束我们之间的争吵。

entry.def: If something gives you peace of mind, it stops you from worrying about a particular problem or difficulty.

example.ex: The main appeal these bonds hold for individual investors is the safety and peace of mind they offer...
example.tran: 这些债券对个人投资者的主要吸引力在于其安全性，令人放心。

example.ex: He began to insist upon a bullet-proof limousine, just for peace of mind.
example.tran: 他开始坚持要防弹豪华轿车，仅仅是为了安心而已。

entry.def: If you express the wish that a dead person may rest in peace, you are showing respect and sympathy for him or her. 'Rest in peace' is also sometimes written on gravestones.
If you are at peace with yourself or at peace with the world, you feel calm and contented, and you have no emotional conflicts within yourself or with other people.

example.ex: Once I knew I was forgiven I could be at peace with myself at last...
example.tran: 一旦我知道自己得到了宽恕，便可以心平气和了。

example.ex: They make you relax. They make you feel at peace with the world.
example.tran: 他们令你放松，让你觉得与世无争。

means.word_mean: 1. the state prevailing during the absence of war
3. the absence of mental stress or anxiety
4. the general security of public places;

sentences.sentence: "he was arrested for disturbing the peace"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French pais, from Latin pax, pac- 'peace'

sentences.cn: 这两个社区和平相处。
sentences.en: The two communities live together in peace .

sentences.cn: 这些国家和平共处已有一个多世纪。
sentences.en: The countries have been at peace for more than a century.

sentences.cn: 争取和平运动
sentences.en: the peace movement (= that tries to prevent war by protesting, persuading politicians, etc.)

sentences.cn: 上周，一些敌对派系领导人签订了和平协议。
sentences.en: Leaders of some rival factions signed a peace agreement last week...

sentences.en: ...two peace campaigners accused of causing damage to an F1-11 nuclear bomber...

sentences.cn: 奥巴马总统意外获得诺贝尔和平奖,引起各方质疑.
sentences.en: A surprise winner . President Obama gets the Nobel Peace Prize . Many ask why.

sentences.cn: 印度省份名)的士兵那是一个长久以来都没有和平的地方.
sentences.en: The soldiers of Aceh, a place that hasn't seen peace in a long, long time.

sentences.cn: 我们热爱和平, 但我们不害怕战争.
sentences.en: We love peace, but we are not afraid of war.

sentences.cn: 我上年纪了,需要一点和平, 一点安了和平静.
sentences.en: I want a mile peace, a little quiet and tranquillity for my old age.

sentences.cn: 从四月开始, 我们就在感受不到任何的和平, 只感受到战争和苦难.
sentences.en: Since April, we had not known any peace, only war and suffering.

sentences.cn: 我们希望和平能持久下去.
sentences.en: We hope that peace will come to stay.

sentences.cn: 国务卿打算启动中东和平进程.
sentences.en: The secretary of state intends to jumpstart the middle east peace process.

sentences.cn: 不论是全面的和平谈判,或者局部的和平谈判, 我们都应当这样去准备.
sentences.en: Whether the peace negotiations are overall or local, we should be prepared for such an eventuality.

sentences.cn: 人们称阿尔弗雷德?诺贝尔是一个热爱和平的人.
sentences.en: People call Alfred Nobel a man of peace.

sentences.cn: 他得到诺贝尔和平奖.
sentences.en: He was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize.

sentences.cn: 和平是促发展的最佳武器.
sentences.en: Peace is the greatest weapon for development.

sentences.cn: 他于和平时期在我们中间维持常备军, 而没有我们议会的同意.
sentences.en: Hehas kept among us , in times of peace, Standing Armies without the Consent of our legislatures.

sentences.cn: 我们这种独立自主的外交政策,最有利于世界和平.
sentences.en: Our independent foreign policy helps greatly to preserve world peace.

sentences.cn: 这些岛屿本该是和平富足之地.
sentences.en: These islands ought to have been a land of peace and plenty.

sentences.cn: 更多的伤亡以及混乱的局势可不能给以色列周边带来和平.
sentences.en: More killing and chaos will not bring peace with Israel nearer.

sentences.cn: 本届大会将侧重两个方面: 维护世界和平和新时期下的经济发展.
sentences.en: This conference will focus on two key missions: upkeep the world peace and promoting economy.

sentences.cn: 单边撤离计划虽然不能带来真正的和平, 但至少能带来平静.
sentences.en: A unilateral withdrawal would not bring formal peace, but it could at least bring calm.

sentences.cn: 他们好像就是不能和睦相处。
sentences.en: They simply can't seem to live in peace with each other.

sentences.cn: 该国劳资关系相对和睦的一段时期
sentences.en: ...a period of relative peace in the country's industrial relations...

sentences.cn: 如果你没法和你弟弟和睦相处，就滚出这座房子。
sentences.en: If you can't live in peace with your little brother then get out of the house.

sentences.cn: 和睦的婚姻, 是这个世界的乐园; 对抗的婚姻, 是这个世界的炼狱.
sentences.en: Marriage , with peace, is this world's paradise; with strife, this life's purgatory.

sentences.cn: 要离恶行善, 寻求和睦,一心追赶.
sentences.en: Turn from evil and do good; seek peace and pursue it.

sentences.cn: 和睦地区原属小河街道和祥符镇, 人烟烯少.
sentences.en: Peace river region of originxiang fu streets and towns , less densely ene.

sentences.cn: 史密斯一家与左邻右舍和睦相处.
sentences.en: The Smiths were living in peace with the neighbors.

sentences.cn: 在我们中间从来就不存在什么通过谅解,和睦相处的问题.
sentences.en: The peace that passes understanding never dwell with us.

sentences.cn: 这不仅是最好的处世之道, 更能给你带来和睦和尊重.
sentences.en: It is not only the best as a matter of principle, but of peace and honor.

sentences.cn: 我母亲总是尽量使我和弟弟和睦相处.
sentences.en: My mother always did all she could to keep peace between my brother and me.

sentences.cn: 在聚会上,你最好同你的对手和睦相处.
sentences.en: It is better at peace with your rivals at the party.

sentences.cn: 你临近一座城要攻打的时候 、 先要对城里的民宣告和睦的话.
sentences.en: When you march up to attack a city, make its people an offer of peace.

sentences.cn: 诗120:6我与那恨恶和睦的人、许久同住.
sentences.en: Too long has my soul had its dwelling With those who hate peace.

sentences.cn: 我需要和睦和宁静, 需要安宁, 但是我的内心翻腾得太厉害了.
sentences.en: I wanted peace and quiet, tranquility, but was too much aboil inside.

sentences.cn: 他和邻居都很和睦.
sentences.en: He is at peace with his neighbours.

sentences.cn: 所有村民都和睦相处.
sentences.en: All the villagers live together in peace.

sentences.cn: 10你临近一座城,要攻打的时候, 先要对城里的民宣告和睦的话.
sentences.en: When thou comest nigh unto a city to fight against it, then proclaim peace unto it.

sentences.cn: 11也要离恶行善. 寻求和睦, 一心追赶.
sentences.en: Let him eschew evil , and do good; let him seek peace, and ensue it.

sentences.cn: 如若可能, 应尽力与众人和睦相处.
sentences.en: If possible , on your part , at peace with all.

sentences.cn: 我们一向希望和邻邦和睦相处.
sentences.en: We always desire to live in peace with our neighbours.

sentences.cn: 然而,在纽约一个特别的组织中, 青少年与成年人却和睦相处.
sentences.en: But in one special program in New York State , adults and teenagers live together in peace.

sentences.cn: 无论是国王还是农夫, 只要家庭和睦,他便是最幸福的人.
sentences.en: He is the happiest, be he king or peasant, who find peace in his home.

sentences.cn: 一个和谐的世界是民主的世界, 和睦的世界, 公正的世界,包容的世界.
sentences.en: A harmonious world should be one of democracy, peace, justice and tolerance.

sentences.cn: 全会众打发人到临门磐的便雅悯人那里、向他们说和睦的话.
sentences.en: Then the whole assembly sent an offer of peace to the Benjamites at of Rimmon.

sentences.cn: 要离恶行善, 寻求和睦,一心追赶. 《诗篇》(犹太-基督教)
sentences.en: Turn away from evil and do good, seek peace and pursue it.

Donna Fredrick's served with the Peace Corps for two years in Brazil.
She joined the Peace Corps after she graduated from the college because she wanted to do something to help other people
She had been brought up on a farm, so the Peace Corps assigned her to an agricultural project.
During her two years with the Peace Corps, Donna lived in a village in northeastern Brazil
Why did Donna join the Peace Corps after she graduated from college?
She wanted to renew her contact with the Peace Corps
By working part time for the Peace Corps.
